casebody.data:
Reginald B. SMITH, Appellant, v. PHŒNIX FUEL SUPPLY CORPORATION, Appellee. FEDERAL INSURANCE COMPANY, Assignee of Richard Hellman, Appellant, v. PHŒNIX FUEL SUPPLY CORPORATION, Appellee. Nos. 367, 368. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. June 8, 1936. Bigham, Englar, Jones & Houston, of New York City (W. J. Nunnally, Jr., of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. James E. Turner, of Brooklyn, N. Y., and Foley & Martin, oí New York City (William B. Davis and Christopher E. Heckman, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
